org.fcrepo.kernel.services

Class DatastreamServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.AbstractService
        • org.fcrepo.kernel.services.DatastreamServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.jcr.FedoraJcrTypes, org.fcrepo.kernel.services.DatastreamService, org.fcrepo.kernel.services.Service

    @Component
public class DatastreamServiceImpl
extends AbstractService
implements org.fcrepo.kernel.services.DatastreamService
    Service for creating and retrieving Datastreams without using the JCR API.
    Author:
    cbeer

      • createDatastream

        public org.fcrepo.kernel.Datastream createDatastream(javax.jcr.Session session,
                                            String dsPath,
                                            String contentType,
                                            String originalFileName,
                                            InputStream requestBodyStream,
                                            URI checksum)
                                              throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException,
                                                     org.fcrepo.kernel.exception.InvalidChecksumException
        Create a new Datastream node in the JCR store
        Specified by:
        createDatastream in interface org.fcrepo.kernel.services.DatastreamService
        Parameters:
        session - the jcr session to use
        dsPath - the absolute path to put the datastream
        contentType - the mime-type for the requestBodyStream
        originalFileName - the original file name for the input stream
        requestBodyStream - binary payload for the datastream
        checksum - the digest for the binary payload (as urn:sha1:xyz) @return
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        org.fcrepo.kernel.exception.InvalidChecksumException
